title: I've got 223/230 in sem 2 ISA  1 chem cycle, is it possible to get 9 SGPA

comments.body: Lol bro either u being very sarcastic or you are very dumb , i assume the latter
pls ban 1st years from this sub they're getting annoying asf

Get serious about your studies 
How did you lose 7 marks 

Now you've to get 39+ in isa 2 and 95+ in esa for 9 sgpa

:)
nah just joking i had actually got 198/230
As a 1st yr guy, i am also frustrated with this...so please üôè üôÇ
God punish those who made fun of my marks
Nah bro, if you study 26hrs a day from now on, you might get 7cgpa. But its not looking good
i've been in this subreddit since 2022 and it‚Äôs gone to absolute shit ever since your batch flooded in.
im already studying so much, but i need to increase my gpa to get DAC scholarship
God punish (√ó infinity) those who flex with their scores here...like dude f u, keep it with urself nig...sryyyy

Let‚Äôs get one thing straight‚ÄîI *earned* this. The grind, the pressure, the late nights‚Äî*I* put in that work. So if you‚Äôve got a problem with me being proud of what I achieved, that‚Äôs your bitterness talking, not my ego.

Don‚Äôt confuse your lack of effort or results with my confidence. If my success makes you uncomfortable, maybe it‚Äôs because it reminds you of what you *didn‚Äôt* do.

I‚Äôm not dimming my shine for anyone. If you don‚Äôt like the flex, look away. But don‚Äôt project your insecurities onto me‚Äîhandle that on your own time.
Bro are you that dumb to not know that 223 can literally land you a MRD Scholarship
no one cares nigga , ur in college now
